rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Agent determines if the customer is a new or established patient
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited before?

rules.title: Inquire about Dental Insurance
rules.condition: Customer is identified as a new patient

rules.title: Gather Insurance Details
rules.condition: New patient states they have dental insurance
rules.action: Agent asks for the name of the insurance and plan type (e.g., PPO or HMO)
rules.example: Could you please tell me the name of your insurance provider and the plan type, such as PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Check In-Network Status
rules.condition: Insurance details are provided by a new patient
rules.action: Agent checks if the office is in-network with the provided insurance
rules.example: Thank you. Let me quickly check if we are in-network with [Insurance Name] [Plan Type].

rules.title: Determine Visit Reason (No Insurance)
rules.condition: Patient indicates they do not have dental insurance
rules.action: Agent asks for the reason for the visit and confirms it
rules.example: No problem at all. What is the main reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Clarify Information
rules.condition: Customer indicates difficulty understanding or asks for clarification
rules.action: Agent clarifies information by repeating or rephrasing
rules.example: I apologize, let me rephrase that. I meant, have you seen a dentist here before?

rules.title: Initiate Scheduling
rules.condition: Basic information (patient status, insurance details or reason for visit) is gathered
rules.action: Agent acknowledges request, states action of checking availability, and offers scheduling assistance
rules.example: Thank you for providing that information. I'll now check our availability for an appointment and help you schedule.

rules.title: Present Appointment Options
rules.action: Agent offers specific dates and times for available appointments, providing multiple options for the customer to choose from
rules.example: I have availability on Monday, October 26th at 10 AM, or Tuesday, October 27th at 2 PM. Which one works best for you?

rules.title: Confirm Chosen Appointment
rules.action: Agent confirms the patient's chosen appointment time and date
rules.example: Great, so you'd like to book for Monday, October 26th at 10 AM, is that right?

rules.title: Gather New Patient Demographics for Finalization
rules.condition: After a new patient confirms an appointment
rules.action: Agent requests the new patient's full name and date of birth to finalize the appointment
rules.example: To finalize your appointment, could you please provide your full name and date of birth?
